mapper.select: SELECT su.`NO` AS 'USER_NO', su.`NAME` AS 'USER_NAME', pmc.MENU_DETAIL AS 'MENU_NAME', pm.MENU_NAME AS 'MENU_TYPE', so.`NAME` AS 'SERVICE_UNIT', sso.`NAME` AS 'RESTAURANT_NAME', pmc.EAT_DATE, sa.AREA_LOCATION, po.NO_EAT_DATE, CONCAT( sso.`NAME`, pbc.BOX_CODE ) AS 'BOX_NAME', IF ( pd.ID <> 'NULL', 1, 0 ) AS 'DELIVERY_FLAG' FROM pz_order po LEFT JOIN pz_order_content poc ON poc.ORDER_ID = po.id AND poc.EAT_FLAG='1' LEFT JOIN pz_menu_content pmc ON poc.CONTENT_ID = pmc.id AND pmc.EAT_DATE= #{eatDate} LEFT JOIN pz_menu pm ON pmc.menu_id=pm.id LEFT JOIN sys_office sso ON po.RESTAURANT_ID = sso.id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON po.user_id = su.id LEFT JOIN sys_office so ON su.office_id = so.id LEFT JOIN sys_area sa ON so.AREA_ID = sa.id LEFT JOIN pz_delivery pd ON po.RESTAURANT_ID = pd.RESTAURANT_ID AND su.office_id = pd.SERVICE_UNIT_ID AND pd.EAT_DATE = #{eatDate} LEFT JOIN pz_box_code pbc ON pbc.id = pd.box_id WHERE po.EAT_DATE = #{eatDates} AND so.ID= #{officeId} AND pmc.MENU_DETAIL is not NULL ORDER BY DELIVERY_FLAG DESC
